## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description | Type                                             | Default         |
| --------- | ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------------- |
| `items`   | --         | 跑动内容列表      | `{ key: number; html: string; link: string; }[]` | `[]`            |
| `speed`   | `speed`    | 多少间隔动一次     | `number`                                         | `3000`          |
| `styleId` | `style-id` | 跑马灯预设样式     | `"tow-row-66h"`                                  | `'tow-row-66h'` |
